article_title: New Saint Al’s Boise leader has ‘empathy’ for frontline staff
article_text:
A former nurse, Odette Bolano says the Catholic approach to care and ministry resonates with her

Bolano comes to Boise from Oakland, where she ran Kaiser Permanente’s East Bay operations

Longtime exec liked Boise’s small-town vibe, culture and recreation, proximity to lawmakers

article_metadata.news-keywords: Odette Bolano, Saint Alphonsus Health System, CHE Trinity, Kaiser Permanente, HCA, Ascension Health, Sally Jeffcoat
article_metadata.description: Odette Bolano, a former nurse, was named last fall as the new president of Saint Alphonsus Regional Medical Center, which includes Saint Alphonsus hospitals and clinics in Boise and Meridian. She previously managed East Bay operations for the nonprofit giant Kaiser Permanente but was attracted to Boise by Trinity Health, its Catholic mission and the Treasure Valley’s quality of life.
article_metadata.title: New Saint Al’s Boise leader has ‘empathy’ for frontline staff | Idaho Statesman
